tags: Wait time,
review:
I got my baby delivered by doctor Harshika. 
I just walked in after having my ultra sound. But I must say it was perfect decision. This doctor never scared me regarding my pregnancy. She just gives sweet smile and says don't worry I am here and everything will be be smooth. Just take care of you and your diet.
I always wanted a normal delivery and at last I got my baby delivered normally.
It was such a homely experience in this hospital. 
Staff over here is very co operative. They really motivated me and were near me when I was in labour pain. At last I gave up but the nurses and staff they helped me to go through this journey.

Thankyou doctor Harshika for this good time with you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got pregnant during the commencement of the lockdown period and was very nervous about it considering the circumstances and my history. However, immediately after the first consultation with Dr. Bavishi I felt markedly reassured. Thereafter throughout the course of the pregnancy Dr. Bavishi was extremely hands on and available at all points to make this a smooth journey. Specially her practical approach played a great hand in calming my nerves in various instances. A special note of thanks to the staff at the maternity home who have made my stay at the maternity home extremely comfortable experience.  Thanks to the efforts of Dr. Bavishi and her team I gave birth to a healthy boy. Highly recommend her and her maternity home.
reply_text: Thank you Rashmi for your kind words. Wish you and your cute baby good luck.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are planning to conceive in a couple of months. So we decided to visit the doctor to get myself checked and ask some doubts before I conceive. There were no issues as such but I was not very satisfied with her responses and behaviour. I felt being judged for my past decisions. She gave half liner replies to my questions. **** ** *** ******* **** ********** ********* **** *** ******* * ***** ** ******* She did not explain things. *** ***** *** ** ******* ** **** * ******* ******** ****** **** ********** ** ****** I would definitely not return and not recommend her. this is just my opinion.
reply_text:
Hi there, we are sorry that your consultation with Dr. Harshika did not go as per expectations. We try our best to answer most of our patient questions in a detailed fashion. However, given the nature of the practice, at times, the doctor may have a pending emergency/ situation to attend to. Nonetheless, you can be rest assured that the guidance you received, though short, is correct. 

As you may know, answers on Google are generic and based on incomplete knowledge, coming not necessarily from professionals . All people and bodies are different. Hence, what applies to one may not apply to another. We strongly recommend that you consult a professional doctor to understand what is right for your body and not rely on Google articles.

Planning a pregnancy is a matter of patience and a process. We believe in slow but steady progress with the least necessary medicines and tests needed. However, these right treatments require regular follow-ups. 

We hold the highest standards in patient satisfaction and appreciate your feedback. As this review is anonymous, we are not able to identify the case, consultation and hence the recommended course of action. Kindly do share your details to help us understand the cause of dissatisfaction and hence address it. 

Alternatively, we would be happy to address your concerns with another consultation (you may choose to do this online or in person).

We wish you the very best of health for your planned pregnancy.

review: She is really friendly and considerate. Listens to your problem carefully and gives the best possible solution.
reply_text: Thank you Janhavi for your kind words. Wish you good health.
